name: Merge Run 3D
description:
Welcome to merge and fight game in blockworld. Have you ever dreamed of becoming a craft hero who can join a team, merge them to make them stronger, and fight against all the enemies? No need to desire, this game is totally for you.

In Hero Craft Run 3D, not only can you challenge yourself with running and overcome all the hardest obstacles but also use your talent, build your own strategy to arrange your crafts, merge them and become the strongest team ever in the block world.

This game is easy to play with only one finger, with awesome 3D graphics with endless addictive challenges. It is a totally free game, horror monsters are everywhere, and we need you! Come and fight to defeat them all!
